promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young mythical gecko water-type pokemon holding a blue crystal bow. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or gecko. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aquaquiverling, a a chibi young mythical gecko water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Final Blowup. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "gecko", "water" or "Aquaquiverling". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, gecko-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, aurora background
generatedDescription: Tiny yet fierce, this maritime sprite harnesses sea vibes for a devastating finisher. Often seen playfully surfing waves in coastal habitats.
